title: James Cleverly – 2022 Statement Following Attack on Poland
author: admin
summary: The statement made by James Cleverly, the Foreign Secretary, on 15 November 2022.
content:
We are urgently looking into reports of missiles landing in Poland, and are in contact with our Polish friends and NATO allies.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
